overview: Teen stepdaughter Alexa Grace thinks she might be falling for her gorgeous stepmother Sarah Jessie. Ever since her dad left, they've been growing closer. Wealthy stepmother Mona Wales pressures teen Nina North to meet a respectable man, but she's afraid to come out as lesbian, and introduces her tomboy girlfriend Aspen Rae in gender neutral terms. Stepmother Sarah Jessie catches her teen stepdaughter Zoey Taylor with a condom and vaporizer. Sarah confiscates both items, however Zoey secretly snatches her stepmother's phone and sends her a duplicitous text for sweet revenge. AJ Applegate explores her sopping wet pussy in front of a mirror in the bathroom, squirting for the first time. Stepmother Mona explains that AJ had her first orgasm and encourages a mother-daughter squirting doublet.
title: Growing Closer
